title: You Don't Need to Press This Button #shorts

media:group.media:title: You Don't Need to Press This Button #shorts
media:group.media:description:
Amsterdam has bicycle "beg buttons" at almost every intersection, but they're usually not necessary, because there are better ways of detecting bicycles at stoplights.
